Here are a few more ideas for a comprehensive leave management system:

1. Scheduling and planning: The system should allow managers to view a calendar of upcoming leave and ensure that adequate coverage is in place. This could include the ability to view leave requests and availability for the entire team in one place.
2. Leave history: The system should keep a record of leave taken by each employee over time, allowing managers to see patterns in leave usage and identify potential issues.
3. Integration with performance management: The system should be able to integrate with a performance management system to allow for the tracking of leave as it relates to employee performance. This could include the ability to set goals and objectives related to leave usage and to track progress towards those goals.
4. Personalization: The system should allow for the personalization of leave entitlements and policies based on factors such as job role, location, or length of service. This will ensure that leave policies are fair and tailored to the needs of individual employees.
5. Leave request templates: The system should allow employees to save leave request templates for commonly used leave types, such as annual leave or sick leave. This will make it easier for employees to request leave and will help to streamline the approval process.
6. Advanced leave forecasting: The system should be able to provide advanced leave forecasting based on past leave usage patterns and future leave requests. This will help managers to better plan for leave and ensure that there is adequate coverage.
7. Leave policies: The system should allow for the creation and management of leave policies, including the ability to set rules and regulations for different leave types and to communicate those policies to employees.
8. Time-off requests: In addition to leave requests, the system should allow for the tracking of other time-off requests, such as vacation or personal days. This will ensure that all types of time-off are tracked and accounted for in a consistent manner.
